TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataColumnSelectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 为表示 控件中绑定列字段的字段名称的属性提供类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter for a property representing the field name of a bound column field in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类将在赋值前的对象类型转换为的控件属性。Use the class to convert object types before assignment to a control property. 一般情况下，类支持字符串对象类型进行转换，并提供了可用于分配给关联的控件属性的标准值的列表。In general, the class supports converting string object types and supplies a list of standard values available for assignment to the associated control property. 标准值集合是当前绑定的列字段的字段名称的列表控件。The standard values collection is the list of field names for bound column fields for the current control. 若要支持其他对象类型进行转换，从派生类，并重写和对其他对象类型的方法。To support converting additional object types, derive a class from and override the and methods for the additional object types. 若要支持自定义列表的标准可赋值的值，重写方法。To support a custom list of standard assignable values, override the method. 应用特性来指定类的控件属性的类型转换器。Apply the attribute to specify the class as the type converter for a control property. 例如，属性控件指定作为其类型转换器。For example, the property of the control specifies as its type converter. > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器对象。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in . 方法指示转换器支持返回通过的可用值列表方法。The method indicates that the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法指示该列表不是可能的值的独占列表。The method indicates that the list is not an exclusive list of possible values.

Public Sub New ()
public: DataColumnSelectionConverter();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器对象。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in .

The type to convert from.

summary.span: 指示指定的源类型是否可转换为关联控件属性的类型。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果转换器能执行转换，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来确定是否方法支持将源类型转换。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type. 方法可以转换只能从一个字符串，因此方法返回`true`时`sourceType`是一个字符串。The method can convert only from a string, so the method returns `true` when `sourceType` is a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value) cil managed

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

param.name: culture
param.span: 可用于支持本地化功能的 对象。

span.span: The object that can be used to support localization features.
The object to convert.

summary.span: 将指定对象转换为关联控件属性的类型。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 一个 实例，表示已转换的对象。

span.span: An instance that represents the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`为一个字符串，则的字符串表示形式`value`返回。If `value` is a string, then the string representation of `value` is returned. 如果`value`是`null`，空字符串 ("") 返回。If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned. 对于所有其他值，引发异常。For all other values, a exception is thrown. 调用方法来确定是否方法支持将源类型转换。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection
public: override System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter::StandardValuesCollection ^ GetStandardValues(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);

param.name: context
param.span: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 实现。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 返回可以分配给关联控件属性的可用值的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: 一个 实例，包含可以分配给关联控件属性的可用值。

span.span: A instance containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用属性指定`context`对象以获取实现。The method uses the property of the specified `context` object to obtain an implementation. 如果实现可用，它用于在设计时访问关联的控件，并检索从关联的可用值列表组件。If the implementation is available, it is used to access the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available values from the associated component. 可用值的集合中的绑定的列字段基于控件。The collection of available values is built from the bound column fields in the control. 绑定的列字段组成中的对象集合，并从数据源中的字段自动生成的绑定的列字段。The bound column fields consist of objects in the collection, and from the bound column fields automatically generated for fields in the data source.

summary.span: 指示此转换器是否返回一个列表，在其中包含可分配给关联的控件属性的所有可能值。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果此转换器返回一个列表，在其中包含可分配给关联的控件属性的所有可能值，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: if this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实例返回`false`，指示返回的列表方法不是所有可赋值的可能值的独占列表。The method for a instance returns `false`, indicating that the list returned by the method is not an exclusive list of all possible assignable values.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool GetStandardValuesSupported (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValuesSupported (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean
public: override bool GetStandardValuesSupported(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context);

param.name: context
param.span: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 实现。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 指示在指定的上下文内，此转换器是否返回一组可以分配给控件属性的值。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a set of available values for assignment to a control property, within the specified context.

returns.span: 如果此转换器返回一组可以分配给关联控件属性的值，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: if this converter returns a standard set of available values for assignment to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指示转换器是否支持返回通过的可用值列表方法。The method indicates whether the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法对象返回`true`如果指定`context`对象提供中的实现其属性。The method for the object returns `true` if the specified `context` object supplies an implementation in its property. 方法使用实现，以在设计时访问关联的控件并检索可用的列表从关联绑定列字段组件。The method uses the implementation to access the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available bound column fields from the associated component.
